reviews.review_msg: The course itself is difficult. Prof. is very nice and helpful. attending all classes and taking notes are important. Her method is different from text. Do all assignments and practice exam, you will be fine. Go to her office hours when you have questions. She is very patient and cares a lot about her students. One of the greatest prof. I have had.

Her methods are very different from the ones in the textbook. So textbooks are only for homework. You wouldn't have many materials to read and study at home, only her notes, which is too little. Tests are hard.
